name: misanthropically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you do not like other people: She misanthropically shut herself away from the world. He complained misanthropically about how stupid the world was.
More examplesFewer examplesThe parrot sat misanthropically on his perch.The director misanthropically condemns the culture he sees around him.The captain sat in his house and misanthropically refused to see anyone.I went to my garden hut and spent the afternoon sulking misanthropically.He shrugged his shoulders misanthropically.
